title: Wizard Academy Exam Adventure #84
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Enchanted Exam Hall
rooms.description: A grand hall with high vaulted ceilings covered in floating candles. Stone walls are lined with portraits of famous wizards. Your exam desk sits in the center, covered with magical instruments and locked compartments. A large blackboard displays glowing runes. The air crackles with magical energy.

items.name: enchanted exam desk
items.description: A wooden desk with three locked drawers and various magical items scattered on top

items.name: exam instruction scroll
items.description: A rolled parchment with official academy seals
items.text: WIZARD ACADEMY EXAM #84: Welcome, apprentice! To pass this exam, you must demonstrate knowledge of our academy's history and magical principles. Remember: Professor Merlindale teaches Spell 1, Professor Thornwick teaches Spell 3, and Professor Nightshade teaches Spell 7. Good luck!

items.name: magical blackboard
items.description: A large slate board with glowing runes and chalk writings
items.text: Today's Lesson: The Three Great Spells. Spell 1 - Illumination (taught by Merlindale). Spell 3 - Levitation (taught by Thornwick). Spell 7 - Transformation (taught by Nightshade). Remember the order: 1, 3, 7.

items.name: towering bookshelf
items.description: A tall shelf filled with ancient spellbooks and magical tomes

items.name: Academy History Volume
items.description: A leather-bound book detailing the academy's past
items.text: The Wizard Academy was founded by Headmaster Aldric Stormweaver in the year 892. The academy's motto is 'Knowledge Through Magic.' Our three founding professors were Merlindale, Thornwick, and Nightshade.

items.name: ornate brass key
items.description: A key with magical runes etched into its surface

items.name: spell component chest
items.description: A wooden chest bound with brass fittings and a keyhole

items.name: advanced potion recipe
items.description: A parchment with instructions for brewing a complex potion
items.text: Master Potion Recipe: This formula was created in the Potion Laboratory by Professor Nightshade. The key ingredient is stored in the cauldron. Remember: only those who know the founder's name, the academy's founding year, and the sacred motto may enter the laboratory.

items.name: crystal wand
items.description: A wand made of pure crystal that glows with inner light

items.name: portrait of Headmaster Aldric
items.description: A large painting of a wise wizard with a long white beard
items.text: Headmaster Aldric Stormweaver - Founder of the Wizard Academy. 'Through knowledge and dedication, all magic is possible.'

items.name: enchanted laboratory door
items.description: A heavy oak door with glowing magical seals. Three questions are inscribed on a brass plaque.

password_questions.question: Who founded the Wizard Academy?
password_questions.hint: Check the Academy History book and the portrait

password_questions.question: In what year was the academy founded?
password_questions.hint: The history book contains this information

password_questions.question: What is the academy's motto?
password_questions.hint: Read the Academy History Volume carefully

rooms.name: Potion Laboratory
rooms.description: A mystical laboratory filled with bubbling cauldrons, shelves of colorful ingredients, and floating bottles. Purple smoke drifts through the air. Crystal vials line the walls, and a large brewing station dominates the center. A golden door at the far end leads to the Headmaster's Chamber.

items.name: master brewing station
items.description: A complex setup with multiple burners, flasks, and measuring instruments

items.name: Professor Nightshade's notes
items.description: Personal notes written in elegant handwriting
items.text: Note to self: The Headmaster's Chamber can only be accessed by those who truly understand our academy. The final exam questions test knowledge of our three founding professors and where the most powerful potions are created.

items.name: ingredient shelves
items.description: Shelves packed with jars of magical ingredients and components

items.name: glowing phoenix feather
items.description: A brilliant red and gold feather that radiates warmth

items.name: iridescent dragon scale
items.description: A shimmering scale that changes colors in the light

items.name: bubbling cauldron
items.description: A massive iron cauldron with green liquid bubbling inside

items.name: golden master key
items.description: A key made of pure gold with the academy crest

items.name: laboratory journal
items.description: A journal documenting various potion experiments
items.text: Laboratory Log: Professor Merlindale specializes in illumination potions. Professor Thornwick excels at levitation elixirs. Professor Nightshade is the master of transformation brews. Together, they created the most powerful potions in this very laboratory.

items.name: golden chamber door
items.description: An ornate golden door with the academy crest. A magical lock displays three final exam questions.

password_questions.question: Name the professor who teaches Spell 1:
password_questions.hint: Check the exam instructions and the blackboard

password_questions.question: Name the professor who teaches Spell 7:
password_questions.hint: The blackboard and laboratory journal mention this

password_questions.question: Where are the most powerful potions created?
password_questions.hint: Professor Nightshade's notes and the laboratory journal reveal this

rooms.name: Headmaster's Chamber
rooms.description: You have reached the Headmaster's private chamber! A magnificent room with walls lined with ancient spellbooks and magical artifacts. A large desk holds a glowing certificate with your name on it. Sunlight streams through stained glass windows depicting great wizards of the past. A shimmering portal swirls in the corner, ready to transport you home.

items.name: graduation certificate
items.description: A magical certificate that glows with golden light
items.text: CONGRATULATIONS! You have successfully completed Wizard Academy Exam #84. You have demonstrated exceptional knowledge of magical history, potion brewing, and spell theory. You are hereby certified as a Graduate Wizard. - Headmaster Aldric Stormweaver

items.name: Headmaster's desk
items.description: An impressive desk made of ancient oak, covered with magical instruments and scrolls

items.name: display of magical artifacts
items.description: A collection of powerful magical items from throughout history

rooms.win_message: Congratulations! You have passed the Wizard Academy Exam with flying colors! The Headmaster's chamber recognizes your achievement, and your certificate glows brightly. You have proven your knowledge of magical history, potion brewing, and the academy's traditions. The shimmering portal activates, ready to transport you home as a certified wizard. You win!
